label: Smaller Logo
value: Scale the logo to approximately 70% of its default size within the red dashed boundary, maintaining centered positioning

label: Position Left
value: Position the logo towards the left side of the red dashed boundary area while maintaining proper proportions

label: Position Right
value: Position the logo towards the right side of the red dashed boundary area while maintaining proper proportions

label: Position Top
value: Position the logo towards the top of the red dashed boundary area while maintaining proper proportions

label: Position Bottom
value: Position the logo towards the bottom of the red dashed boundary area while maintaining proper proportions
